code:
/** * Resend Email Service * Modern, reliable email service with beautiful templates * * Setup: * 1. Sign up at https://resend.com/ * 2. Get API key from dashboard * 3. Add to .env: REACT_APP_RESEND_API_KEY=your_key_here */export class ResendService{static async sendQuote(data){if(!this.API_KEY){throw new Error('Resend API key not configured. Please add REACT_APP_RESEND_API_KEY to your .env file');}try{const emailData={from:'Instant Quote Builder ',to:[data.customerEmail],subject:"Your Moving Quote - ".concat(data.customerName),html:this.generateEmailHTML(data)};console.log('Sending email with Resend:',emailData);const response=await fetch(this.API_URL,{method:'POST',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(this.API_KEY),'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(emailData)});if(!response.ok){const errorData=await response.json();throw new Error("Resend API error: ".concat(errorData.message||response.statusText));}const result=await response.json();console.log('Email sent successfully:',result);return true;}catch(error){console.error('Resend email sending failed:',error);throw new Error("Email sending failed: ".concat(error.message));}}static generateEmailHTML(data){return" Your Moving Quote

INSTANT QUOTE BUILDER

Professional Moving Services

Your Moving Quote is Ready!

Hi ".concat(data.customerName,",

Thank you for choosing Instant Quote Builder for your move. We've prepared a detailed quote based on your inventory and requirements.

Move Details

From: ").concat(data.originAddress,"

To: ").concat(data.destinationAddress,"

Move Date: ").concat(data.moveDate,"

Total Estimate: $").concat(data.totalAmount.toFixed(2),"

View Your Detailed Quote

This quote includes:

  • Detailed inventory analysis
  • Professional moving services
  • Additional services (if selected)
  • Interactive quote viewer with accept/decline options

If you have any questions, you can ask them directly in the quote viewer.

Best regards,
Instant Quote Builder Team

This quote is valid for 30 days from the date of generation.

For support, contact us at support@instantquotebuilder.com

");}}ResendService.API_KEY=process.env.REACT_APP_RESEND_API_KEY;ResendService.API_URL='https://api.resend.com/emails';
